bibl.title: Contracted Biceps in Pindar.
bibl.note: Contraction should no more be assumed in the passages discussed (O. 14 str. 8-9; - Pae. 6 ep. 11; - Fr. 169a str. 7; - Pae. 4.51) than in the passages of the epinicians already long since emended. - Appendix: The Syntax of Pae. 6.54-8.
bibl.seg: HENRY W.B., Contracted Biceps in Pindar.

Contraction should no more be assumed in the passages discussed (O. 14 str. 8-9; - Pae. 6 ep. 11; - Fr. 169a str. 7; - Pae. 4.51) than in the passages of the epinicians already long since emended. - Appendix: The Syntax of Pae. 6.54-8.
